mapper.sql: SELECT t.id id, t.from_account_Id fromAccountId, t.from_userName fromUserName, t.from_cn_userName fromCnUserName, t.to_account_Id toAccountId, t.to_userName toUserName, t.to_cn_userName toCnUserName, t.amt amt, t.rem rem, t.contract_no contractNo, t.state state, t.file_id fileId, t.seq_no seqNo, t.order_id orderId, t.order_no orderNo, t.type, t.return_Code returnCode, t.return_msg returnMsg, t.business_code businessCode, t.input_date inputDate, t.feild_order_no feildOrderNo, t.feild_order_no_his feildOrderNoHis, t.tender_id tenderId, lend_cust_id lendCustId, lend_no lendNo, loan_cust_id loanCustId, loan_no loanNo FROM t_fuiou_ftp_field t
mapper.select: SELECT t.order_id orderId FROM t_fuiou_ftp_field t WHERE t.state = 4 GROUP BY t.order_id
SELECT t.return_Code returnCode FROM t_fuiou_ftp_field t WHERE t.order_no = #{orderNo} GROUP BY t.return_Code
SELECT t.from_account_Id fromAccountId FROM t_fuiou_ftp_field t WHERE t.order_no=#{orderNo} AND t.tender_id=-1 AND t.lend_cust_id IS NULL AND t.lend_no IS NULL
